thread.title: Brian McFadden is winning weight battle as he shows off trim beach body on holiday with girlfriend
thread.title_full: Brian McFadden is winning weight battle as he shows off trim beach body on holiday with girlfriend

author: Karen Rockett
title: Brian McFadden is winning weight battle as he shows off trim beach body on holiday with girlfriend
text:
Showbiz Brian McFadden is winning weight battle as he shows off trim beach body on holiday with girlfriend The former Westlife singer was having fun in the sun with Danielle Parkinson, 36, a former Olympic hopeful he began dating last year Share Brian McFadden with girlfriend Danielle Parkinson (Photo: MEGA) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Going out with a PE teacher is clearly suiting Brian McFadden , spotted looking trim on a Barbados beach with his sporty girlfriend. 
The former Westlife singer, who has fought a well-documented battle with his weight, was having fun in the sun with Danielle Parkinson, 36, who the Sunday People understands is a former Olympic hopeful he began dating last year. 
Maybe the heptathlete’s influence has helped him get in shape before his April tour with his new “Irish supergroup” Boyzlife – made up of Brian, 36, and ex- Boyzone star Keith Duffy , 42. Danielle is a former Olympic hopeful (Photo: MEGA) Brian puts his arm round his beach babe (Photo: MEGA) The former Westlife singer is to tour with his new group Boyzlife in April (Photo: MEGA) Danielle is a professional heptathelete (Photo: MEGA) 
Brian and Danielle, who works at a school in Rochdale, were on holiday with his daughters Lily-Sue, 13, and Molly,14, from his marriage to Atomic Kitten ’s Kerry Katona . Showing she's a well balanced woman (Photo: MEGA) Brian gives Danielle a good stone to skim (Photo: MEGA) Winding up for the throw (Photo: MEGA) Looking for more stones, Brian? (Photo: MEGA) 
Brian has admitted bingeing on fast food and being on and off diets for years. But as these pics show, all that hard work has not gone to waist. The trim pair stare out to sea (Photo: MEGA) Something catches Danielle's eye (Photo: MEGA) Brian smiles in the sun (Photo: MEGA) Danielle gets in a bit of beach training (Photo: MEGA) Like us on Facebook
